title: Epson ES3000 Ultra Portable Projection Screen (V12H002S3Y),Black/White
features: Select the size that best meets your needs with the screen-size selector switch
description: Product Description
EPSON ES3000 Ultra Portable Projector Screen (V12H002S3Y).
From the Manufacturer

Easy setup. Expandable to three popular sizes. — An easy-to-use, portable projection screen, the ES3000 is ideal for the mobile presenter. Designed to expand to the size that best meets your needs, it will easily open to three popular sizes: standard 4:3, widescreen 16:9 or widescreen 16:10. This innovative projection screen from Epson provides the perfect solution for both brilliant business presentations and amazing home theater applications. Take it anywhere. With the included wheeled case, it’s easy to transport. And, setup is simple. With its unique, one-piece design, there’s no need to assemble various components. In no time at all, you’ll be ready to sit back and enjoy brilliant images on a bright white screen. When it’s time to shut down, the ES3000 stores quickly and easily.
Select the size that best meets your needs with the screen-size selector switch — screen easily opens to the size you have selected (4:3, 16:9 or 16:10)

Ideal for use with Epson projectors — the best-selling projectors in the world

Epson offers a wide range of high-quality, 3LCD projectors to meet almost any need. Built with image quality and reliability in mind, Epson projectors enhance communication and inspire collaboration, while offering a low total cost of ownership. From ultraportable projectors designed for educational settings to boardroom-ready business projectors, Epson has the model made for you.
